meanings.definition: To check again for accuracy or correctness.
meanings.sent1: I will be rechecking my answers to make sure they are correct.
meanings.sent2: She always rechecks her work before submitting it.
meanings.sent3: The detective kept rechecking the evidence to solve the case.
meanings.sent4: Rechecking the map, he realized he had taken the wrong turn.
meanings.sent5: Rechecking is important to avoid mistakes.

meanings.definition: The act of verifying or confirming something by checking it again.
meanings.sent1: The rechecking of the data revealed a mistake in the calculations.
meanings.sent2: After the initial check, the rechecking process was necessary for accuracy.
meanings.sent3: The constant rechecking of the inventory made the employee feel like a robot.
meanings.sent4: The rechecking of the document was like a security measure for accuracy.
meanings.sent5: The rechecking of the facts clarified any doubts.
